channel.title: SQL 2008 on Niels Berglund
channel.description: Recent content in SQL 2008 on Niels Berglund

item.title: Debugging in SQL Server 2008
item.description: As good as SQL 2005 was (well, still are), one disappointment was that you needed Visual Studio if you wanted to debug your stored procedures. Seriously, what was MS thinking when they did that, especially as in SQL 2000, Query Analyzer had debug capabilities?!!
